Package com.soebes.maven.plugins.uptodate

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractUpToDateMojo  
    DependencyMojo
    Will check dependencies of your project and fail the build if they are not up-to-date.
    HelpMojo
    Display help information on uptodate-maven-plugin.
    Call mvn uptodate:help -Ddetail=true -Dgoal=<goal-name> to display parameter details.
    ParentMojo
    Will check the parent of your project and fail the build if the parent is not the newest available version of the parent.
